properties.displayName: Create a new contact or update an existing one if email or phone matches (upsert)
properties.name: contactCreateNotice
email
properties.description: Email or Phone are required to create contact

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Phone or Email are required to create contact. Phone number has to start with a valid country code leading with + sign.

values.name: fieldId
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: dnd
options.description: Whether automated/manual outbound messages are permitted to go out or not. True means NO outbound messages are permitted.

options.name: name
options.description: The full name of the contact, will be overwritten by 'First Name' and 'Last Name' if set

options.name: tags
options.hint: Comma separated list of tags, array of strings can be set in expression

options.name: timezone
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: dnd
options.description: Whether automated/manual outbound messages are permitted to go out or not. True means NO outbound messages are permitted.

options.name: name
options.description: The full name of the contact, will be overwritten by 'First Name' and 'Last Name' if set

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: query
options.description: Query will search on these fields: Name, Phone, Email, Tags, and Company Name

properties.name: email
properties.description: Lookup Contact by Email. If Email is not found it will try to find a contact by phone.

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Lookup Contact by Phone. It will first try to find a contact by Email and than by Phone.

properties.name: pipelineId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: stageId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: contactIdentifier
properties.description: Either Email, Phone or Contact ID
properties.hint: There can only be one opportunity for each contact.

options.name: assignedTo
options.description: Choose staff member from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: monetaryValue
options.description: Monetary value of lead opportunity

options.name: tags
options.hint: Comma separated list of tags, array of strings can be set in expression

properties.name: opportunityId
properties.hint: You cannot update an opportunity's pipeline ID.

values.name: batchSize
values.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.

values.name: batchInterval
values.description: Time (in milliseconds) between each batch of requests. 0 for disabled.

options.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
options.description: Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible

options.name: proxy
options.description: HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128

options.name: timeout
options.description: Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
